attributes.action: Take steps to force oil companies and petrol/diesel retailers to pass on recent reductions in the price of oil to customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The government are more than happy to legislate against the ordinary citizen/tax payer.  It is less keen to enforce decent behaviour amongst companies and businesses.  The price of oil has dropped recently by about 6% and yet the cost of fuel at the pump has remained the same.  Time for the goverment to act.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
